com.robotgame.gameengine.Robot

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robotgame.gameengine.Robot.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a robot in a match. Important parts is the NodeSystem handling sensors and logic, and the RobotState describing the robots current state. Created with the static factory RobotFactory.CreateRobot().
    See Also:
    NodeSystem, RobotState, RobotFactory

      • GetHotConnections

        public boolean[] GetHotConnections()
        Gets a list of the values sent through every connection. To use this for real time visualization of the node system the connections need to have matching indices in front and backend. This may not be the case.
        Returns:
        Array of boolean values, one for each connection.
